data.text: Ao Onyankopɔn, amanaman no ato ahyɛ wʼagyapadeɛ so;
Wɔahwie mogya agu te sɛ nsuo
Ao Awurade, ɛnkɔsi da bɛn? Wo bo bɛfu afebɔɔ anaa?
Mfa yɛn agyanom bɔne so asotwe mma yɛn;
Ao Onyankopɔn yɛn Agyenkwa, boa yɛn,
Adɛn enti na ɛsɛ sɛ amanaman ka sɛ,
Ma nneduafoɔ no apinisie nnuru wʼanim;
Ao Awurade, ahohora a yɛn mfɛfoɔ asum agu wo soɔ no,
Na yɛn a yɛyɛ wo nkurɔfoɔ, wʼadidibea nnwan no,
